name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, a video went viral online. In the video, security guards tried to detain the old man's tricycle. The old man had no choice but to kneel down and beg them for mercy, saying, "Dad, I'm 85 years old, please spare my life."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 14, Henan. The Internet reported that Henan Polytechnic University banned students from riding bicycles. A student was stopped by security guards when he went out on a bicycle, and a physical conflict broke out between the two sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Weinan, Shaanxi. Construction work at Jinqiao Coal Mine in Heyang damaged villagers’ houses, and villagers used their bodies to block the forklifts from moving forward, during which time disputes and shoving broke out between the two sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Vtad9fOjo4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Nanhua Temple incident continues to ferment.
On November 15, the Qujiang District Party Committee's Internet Information Office called the person who filmed the video and asked him to contact overseas media to delete the video on the grounds that it involved a religious incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, the Chinese Consulate in Germany said that it had arrested a 43-year-old Chinese suspect in a serial rape case. The man pretended to be a woman and went to the victim's residence under the pretext of renting a house through platforms such as Xiaohongshu and WeChat to rape her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, the police reported that five attackers from the China Railway Seventh Engineering Group Co., Ltd. project department were detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 14, Tianjin.
A group of elderly people who lost their only child protested in front of the Tianjin Health Supervision Office that the government did not implement the pension policy for families who lost their only child.
They held up signs that read "It's good to have only one child left, the government will take care of the elderly", shouted slogans such as "Family Planning Commission, big liar" and "Today in Tianjin, tomorrow in Beijing", and posted signs on their bodies that read "It's not a crime to lose your only child, and it's reasonable to petition."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Henan. A little boy pasted a portrait of Mao Zedong on the wall, then knelt down and kowtowed to it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 15, Chinese Ambassador to the United States Xie Feng said: China-US relations are the most important bilateral relations in the world today and should be protected like protecting a mother river.
Netizens responded, "So should we hate each other now?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Lancet published a study on Chinese medicine for the first time. The results showed that the Chinese medicine "Stroke Brain Revival Solution" for treating cerebral hemorrhage did not improve the patient's survival rate and quality of life compared with placebo.
Subsequently, Guo Jianwen, one of the researchers of the drug, held a "Major Scientific Research Results Press Conference" at Guangdong Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine, mentioning that the study confirmed the safety of the drug.
Netizens responded, "It is indeed worth celebrating, letting people know about a useless prescription"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 15, Beijing. Netizens posted a video of a Beijing VIP ward. The video shows that the ward is fully equipped with furniture and appliances, a reception room, office area, and even a large garden.
Netizens responded, "Isn't socialist welfare for the poor?"
"Seeing a doctor is like a vacation. The gap between people is too big"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 16, Hunan. Blogger "Dake Tang" forwarded an article on Zhihu: If Taiwan is destroyed, the debt can be reduced by about trillions, but an intact Taiwan may add tens of trillions of debt to the country.
Netizens expressed their support in the comment area.
Another netizen said, "If Taiwan surrenders directly, how will you respond?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 14, Shenyang, Liaoning. The owner of a sock factory posted a video saying that he went to the bank to withdraw 1 million to pay employees and keep the factory running, but the bank rejected his request.
 The bank stated that large cash withdrawals currently require the consent of the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, Wang Yong, a professor at China University of Political Science and Law, published an article criticizing distant-water fishing, calling it "robbery in accordance with the law." Currently, the article has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 15, students from Henan Vocational University, Agricultural University and other universities posted articles complaining about the recent school closures.
Some students said: The school said the closure was for student safety, but in fact it was to prevent students from going out for cycling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 15 (published), Wu Fei, a professor of philosophy at Peking University, wrote: After returning from the United States, I found that Peking University has become unrecognizable to me. Peking University people no longer raise their arms and shout to awaken the ignorant and weak people as cultural giants, and they can no longer find the high morale to fight against the decadent social reality.
Under the pressure of the projects that promised a lot of money, teachers produce piles of academic garbage, and students are exhausted and wasted their youth under the endless teaching reforms...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/U9yM26DOh1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 16 (Release), Shandong. Blogger "Xiaogang" interviewed a worker: Are you happy? The worker replied: I am not happy at all, I can't even solve the most basic food and clothing problem.
The worker said that he is 26 years old and works in decoration, with an annual salary of 50,000 to 60,000 yuan, but he often has no work. Experts say that the average deposit of 110,000 yuan per person is nonsense, and hard work can never change fate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 16 (Release) Zhengzhou, Henan. Recently, Yuan Xiaogang, Vice President of Zhengzhou People's Court, was named "National Model Judge", which caused dissatisfaction and complaints from village bank depositors. The depositors said that Yuan Xiaogang did not let all depositors see judicial justice. 
"If a vicious incident like Zhuhai happens, I think it's not strange at all. President Xi said that the people should see judicial justice"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15 (Released) Ukrainian troops seized a Soviet flag, which they threw on the ground and trampled on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 14, Guo Songmin, the first prize winner of the 15th Journalism Award, published an article criticizing the fact that there was a statue of Shakespeare in the square of the Central Academy of Drama. "How can we talk about cultural confidence in this case?"

Netizens expressed their support for Guo Songmin's point of view, "Shakespeare must be the father of the school leaders"

"Is Shakespeare as good as our four great Yuan opera masters?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 15, Yunnan. A man posted a video saying: The leaders are not very knowledgeable. Some jobs need people with knowledge to do them. Your job is always to stabilize the situation.
"I suggest that the group centered on you compromise, and don't wait until the huge waves pass, when all the dignity will be gone."
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One man dies in battle, the whole family gets rich, and the "death economy" makes Russia rich

The Wall Street Journal reported that a 35-year-old man who died one year after joining the battlefield will receive a pension of about $150,000, which is more than a 35-year-old man can earn by working in an ordinary job until he is 60 years old.

Dying after one year in battle will earn a man more money financially than if he continues to live. Experts call this phenomenon "death economy"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Russia. A Chinese student posted that Russian students called Chinese students "like pigs". The picture shows that Russian students called Chinese students "like pigs" and there were onions, garlic, cabbage and other food thrown by students in the sink. "Please respect the work of the cleaners. Netizens think this is racial discrimination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 16, Wuxi, Jiangsu. An indiscriminate knife attack occurred at Wuxi Institute of Technology, and many people fell to the ground.
It was reported online that the attacker was owed wages by the factory and worked 16 hours a day. In addition, the school did not issue him a diploma, which prevented him from graduating.
The attacker said, "I hope my death can promote the progress of labor laws." "Don't think I am an honest man. Some accounts must be settled."
Insider: "They have been rescued. There are too many people."
